title: Toy Story
overview: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy.

title: Jumanji
overview: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped in it for decades.

title: Grumpier Old Men
overview: A romantic comedy about finding love later in life, despite grumpy exteriors.

overview: Women bond over life, love, and heartbreak in this emotional story.

overview: The story of a father coming to terms with his daughter’s growing family.

overview: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue.

title: Sabrina
overview: An ugly duckling blossoms into a charming swan in this romantic retelling.

overview: Two best friends witness a murder and must prove what they saw.

title: Sudden Death
overview: A former firefighter must save a stadium from terrorists.

overview: James Bond teams up with a Russian programmer to stop a nuclear satellite.

overview: A parody of classic vampire films with Dracula and Van Helsing.

title: Balto
overview: A sled dog risks his life to deliver medicine to a remote town.

overview: A biographical story of the complex life of Richard Nixon.

overview: A female pirate searches for a hidden treasure map.

overview: A tale of greed, betrayal, and murder in the world of Las Vegas casinos.

overview: Two sisters learn about love and loss in 19th century England.

overview: Four stories intersect in a quirky hotel on New Year's Eve.

overview: A wacky pet detective returns to save a sacred bat.

title: Money Train
overview: Two brothers attempt a subway train robbery.

title: Get Shorty
overview: A loan shark finds success in the movie industry.

title: Copycat

overview: A veteran hitman is targeted by a younger rival.

title: Powder
overview: A boy with incredible powers struggles to connect with the world.

title: Leaving Las Vegas
overview: A man drinks himself to death in Las Vegas with a kind-hearted escort.

title: Othello
overview: A film adaptation of Shakespeare's classic tragedy.

title: Now and Then
overview: Four friends reminisce about a pivotal summer from their childhood.

title: Persuasion
overview: A woman is reunited with a man she was once persuaded not to marry.

overview: A young boy becomes involved with a gangster and his mistress.

title: Dangerous Minds
overview: A teacher inspires inner-city students through unconventional methods.

title: Twelve Monkeys
overview: A convict is sent back in time to stop a deadly virus.

title: Babe
overview: A pig becomes an unexpected hero on a sheep farm.

title: Dead Man Walking
overview: A nun helps a death row inmate find redemption.

title: It Takes Two
overview: Two girls switch places to reunite a bachelor and a social worker.

title: Clueless
overview: A fashionable teen plays matchmaker in her high school.

title: To Die For
overview: An ambitious woman will stop at nothing to become famous.

title: Home for the Holidays
overview: A woman returns home for a chaotic Thanksgiving with her family.

title: The Big Green
overview: A ragtag group of kids form a soccer team.

title: Georgia
overview: A struggling singer lives in the shadow of her successful sister.

title: Kids
overview: A raw portrayal of teens in New York City.

title: Strange Days
overview: A former cop sells recordings of people's memories and gets involved in a conspiracy.

title: The Indian in the Cupboard
overview: A boy discovers his toy comes to life in a magical cupboard.

title: Mr. Holland's Opus
overview: A music teacher touches the lives of his students over 30 years.

title: Two if by Sea
overview: A couple tries to escape with a stolen painting.

title: While You Were Sleeping
overview: A lonely woman saves a man and is mistaken for his fiancée.

title: The Postman
overview: A drifter becomes a symbol of hope in a post-apocalyptic world.

title: Nowhere
overview: A surreal teen film about strange events in Los Angeles.

title: Mortal Kombat
overview: Fighters from Earth battle in a tournament to save the world.

title: The Usual Suspects
overview: A conman tells a complex story about a heist and a mysterious criminal.

title: Iron Man
overview: After being held captive, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

title: The Incredible Hulk
overview: Scientist Bruce Banner must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper.

title: Iron Man 2
overview: Tony Stark grapples with pressure from the government, rivals, and his own declining health.

title: Thor
overview: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard and sent to Earth to live among humans.

overview: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America to fight the Nazis.

title: The Avengers
overview: Earth’s mightiest heroes must band together to stop Loki and his alien army.

overview: Tony Stark faces a powerful terrorist known as the Mandarin, and questions the role of Iron Man.

overview: Thor must save the universe from the Dark Elves and a mysterious weapon known as the Aether.

overview: A con man is armed with a suit that allows him to shrink and must pull off a heist to save the world.

overview: A neurosurgeon discovers a hidden world of magic and alternate dimensions.

overview: The Avengers and their allies must stop Thanos from collecting all the Infinity Stones.
